verses.verse: <S%H8085>Hear<s%> you <S%H2063>this,<s%> O <S%H3548>priests;<s%> and <S%H7181>listen,<s%> you <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> and give you <S%H238>ear,<s%> O <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H4428>king;<s%> for <S%H4941>judgment<s%> is toward you, <S%H3588>because<s%> you have <S%H1961>been<s%> a <S%H6341>snare<s%> on <S%H4709>Mizpah,<s%> and a <S%H7568>net<s%> <S%H6566>spread<s%> on <S%H8396>Tabor.<s%>
And the <S%H7846>rebels<s%> are <S%H6009>profound<s%> to make <S%H7819>slaughter,<s%> though I have been a <S%H4148>rebuker<s%> of them <S%H3605>all.<s%>

I <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H669>Ephraim,<s%> and <S%H3478>Israel<s%> is not <S%H3582>hid<s%> from me: for now, O <S%H669>Ephraim,<s%> you <S%H2181>commit<s%> <S%H2181>prostitution,<s%> and <S%H3478>Israel<s%> is <S%H2930>defiled.<s%>

They will not <S%H5414>frame<s%> their <S%H4611>doings<s%> to <S%H7725>turn<s%> to their <S%H430>God:<s%> for the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of <S%H2183>prostitutions<s%> is in the <S%H7130>middle<s%> of them, and they have not <S%H3045>known<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And the <S%H1347>pride<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> does <S%H6030>testify<s%> to his <S%H6440>face:<s%> therefore shall <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> <S%H3782>fall<s%> in their <S%H5771>iniquity:<s%> <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> shall <S%H3782>fall<s%> with them.

They shall <S%H3212>go<s%> with their <S%H6629>flocks<s%> and with their <S%H1241>herds<s%> to <S%H1245>seek<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> but they shall not <S%H4672>find<s%> him; he has <S%H2502>withdrawn<s%> himself from them.

They have dealt <S%H898>treacherously<s%> against the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> for they have <S%H3205>begotten<s%> <S%H2114>strange<s%> <S%H1121>children:<s%> <S%H6258>now<s%> shall a <S%H2320>month<s%> <S%H398>devour<s%> them with their <S%H2506>portions.<s%>

<S%H8628>Blow<s%> you the <S%H7782>cornet<s%> in <S%H1390>Gibeah,<s%> and the <S%H2689>trumpet<s%> in <S%H7414>Ramah:<s%> <S%H7321>cry<s%> <S%H7321>aloud<s%> at <S%H1007>Bethaven,<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> you, O <S%H1144>Benjamin.<s%>

<S%H669>Ephraim<s%> shall be <S%H8047>desolate<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H8433>rebuke:<s%> among the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> have I made <S%H3045>known<s%> that which shall <S%H539>surely<s%> be.

The <S%H8269>princes<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> were like them that <S%H5253>remove<s%> the <S%H1366>bound:<s%> therefore I will <S%H8210>pour<s%> out my <S%H5678>wrath<s%> on them like <S%H4325>water.<s%>
Therefore will I be to <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> as a <S%H6211>moth,<s%> and to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> as <S%H7538>rottenness.<s%>

When <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> his <S%H2483>sickness,<s%> and <S%H3063>Judah<s%> saw his <S%H4205>wound,<s%> then <S%H3212>went<s%> <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> to the <S%H804>Assyrian,<s%> and <S%H7971>sent<s%> to <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H3377>Jareb:<s%> yet <S%H3201>could<s%> he not <S%H7495>heal<s%> you, <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H1455>cure<s%> you of your <S%H4205>wound.<s%>

For I will be to <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> as a <S%H7826>lion,<s%> and as a <S%H3715>young<s%> <S%H3715>lion<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah:<s%> I, even I, will <S%H2963>tear<s%> and <S%H3212>go<s%> away; I will <S%H5375>take<s%> away, and <S%H369>none<s%> shall <S%H5337>rescue<s%> him.

I will <S%H3212>go<s%> and <S%H7725>return<s%> to my <S%H4725>place,<s%> <S%H5704>till<s%> they acknowledge their <S%H816>offense,<s%> and <S%H1245>seek<s%> my <S%H6440>face:<s%> in their <S%H6862>affliction<s%> they will <S%H7836>seek<s%> me <S%H7836>early.<s%>
